body:
Well, Susan asked me to make a list of broken links and send it to Brian Bockelman. 

Yesterday, I sent him a list (pdf file) and he asked me to do a pull request.

 

Thank you & Regards,

Zalak Shah

Systems Analyst

CACR | Indiana University

2719 E. 10th Street, Suite 231 | Bloomington, IN 47408 

 <mailto:zsshah@iu.edu> zsshah@iu.edu

 

 

From: Derek Weitzel [mailto:notifications@github.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 16, 2017 2:50 PM
To: opensciencegrid/security <security@noreply.github.com>
Cc: Shah, Zalak Sunilkumar <zsshah@iu.edu>; Author <author@noreply.github.com>
Subject: Re: [opensciencegrid/security] List of broken links on the page: https://opensciencegrid.github.io/security/ (#1)

 

What is this? Are you uploading a PDF to the Repo with a list of broken links? could you just edit the page and fix the links? Then send in that pull request?

—
You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <https://github.com/opensciencegrid/security/pull/1#issuecomment-287155833> , or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AUOT1juNTjIyJkulr2V1O0vuoBUjjhXwks5rmYRVgaJpZM4MfuR2> .
